headline: Citigroup to Launch $80B Portfolio Offering With BlackRock
summary: C teams up with BLK to launch an $80B global portfolio platform, blending its advisory with BLK's investment expertise.

headline: US Bancorp Stock: Is USB Underperforming the Financial Services Sector?
summary: While US Bancorp has underperformed the broader financial services sector over the past year, it has outperformed in recent months, and analysts remain optimistic about the stock’s prospects.
